channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS

item.title: CVE-2018-7246|2024-08-05T06:24:11.827Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- 66074%20mge%20network%20management%20card%20transverse%20installed%20in%20mge%20ups%20and%20mge%20sts
item.description: A cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS. he integrated web server (Port 80/443/TCP) of the affected devices could allow remote attackers to discover an administrative account. If default on device, it is not using a SSL in settings and if multiple request of the page "Access Control" (IP-address device/ups/pas_cont.htm) account data will be sent in cleartext

item.title: CVE-2018-7245|2024-08-05T06:24:11.357Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- 66074%20mge%20network%20management%20card%20transverse%20installed%20in%20mge%20ups%20and%20mge%20sts
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability exists In Schneider Electric's 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS. The integrated web server (Port 80/443/TCP) of the affected devices could allow a remote attacker to change UPS control and shutdown parameters or other critical settings without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2018-7243|2024-08-05T06:24:11.636Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- 66074%20mge%20network%20management%20card%20transverse%20installed%20in%20mge%20ups%20and%20mge%20sts
item.description: An authorization bypass vulnerability exists In Schneider Electric's 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS. The integrated web server (Port 80/443/TCP) of the affected devices could allow a remote attacker to get a full access to device, bypassing the authorization system.

item.title: CVE-2018-7244|2024-08-05T06:24:11.508Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- 66074%20mge%20network%20management%20card%20transverse%20installed%20in%20mge%20ups%20and%20mge%20sts
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists In Schneider Electric's 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS. The integrated web server (Port 80/443/TCP) of the affected devices could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive device information if network access was obtained.
